mapper.select: select shk.JSYF, shk.HCDW, swjg.swjg_mc as HSDWMC, sum(shk.YDZS) as YDZS, sum(shk.YHCYDS) as YHCYDS, SUM(shk.WHCYDS) as WHCYDS from swrd_kp.swrd_hclc_kp shk left join kjhsgl.di_swjg swjg on shk.HCDW = swjg.swjg_dm where shk.JSYF = #{form.jsyf} and shk.HCDW = #{form.swjgDm} and shk.yxbz = 'Y' group by JSYF,HCDW
